SalesforcePayment.name: SalesforcePayment
SalesforcePayment.description: Read-only virtual object used in the Your Account App. Represents information about payments related to your organizationâ€™s Salesforce invoice.

AppliedAmount.description: Payment amount applied to your Salesforce invoice.

AppliedDate.description: Date the payment is applied to your Salesforce invoice.

Memo.description: Credit memo ID. Credit memos are issued for overpayment, rebates, and so forth.

PaymentCurrency.description: Type of currency used for the payment.

SalesforcePaymentType.description: Payment method. Possible values are: Boleto Check Credit Card Credit Memo Direct Debit Unknown Wire Transfer
